abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the
            Secondary and Local Roads Project are to: upgrade and
            rehabilitate the secondary and local roads network; and
            increase Roads Department of the Ministry of Regional
            Development and Infrastructure's (RDMRDI's) and
            local governments' capacity to manage the road network
            in a cost-effective and sustainable manner. The changes will
            enable Georgia to complete the rehabilitation of two road
            sections under the project. Due to an 8 month delay in the
            rehabilitation of two road sections under the project, a
            closing date extension will be needed from its current
            October 31, 2011 to June 30, 2012. This closing date
            extension will allow the full achievement of the Project
            Development Objective (PDO).
